title: Legal Notice
content:
Legal Notice

The website https://boutique.gongfucha.fr is published by Stéphane Langlois, Yalin Cheng, Brut de thé, and hosted by GitHub.

The company is registered under number 899 032 494 and APE code 94.99Z with the registry of the court of Foix,
with its head office located at 15 rue de la montagne, 09320 Massat.

Payments are processed via Stripe: Legal Notice.

Publication Directors: Stéphane Langlois, Yalin Cheng: coucou@gongfucha.fr.

This shop is created by www.gongfucha.fr, and the product is available under an open license CC0.1 - GitHub Repository.

Crédit

  • newick for his help with css.
  • Antoine Vernois for his “co-piloting”.
